tourName: French Polynesia 10 night small ship cruise
generalInfo:
French Polynesia is a collection of over 100 islands in the South Pacific, where the Society Islands form its largest and most well-known archipelago. These Islands are divided into the Windward Islands (including Tahiti and Moorea) and the Leeward Islands (including Bora Bora, Raiatea, and Tahaa). The perfect destinations for romantics and adventurers eager to explore French Polynesia's beauty, equally, for travellers desiring a comprehensive and slower journey through the Society Islands.

Uncover these two Archipelagos on a small ship cruise. Island hopping allows you to see every landscape, from geometric ridges strung with waterfalls on the high islands to flat, desert-like atolls where lagoons far outsize the landmass.

Experience the essence of Bora Bora; the crown jewel of The South Pacific, where breath taking beauty meets cultural richness. Discover Raiatea; The Sacred Heart of the Society Islands which continues to inspire awe as a sacred place believed to house the spirits of ancient ancestors, and so much more.

dayInfo.description: Your adventure begins at the picturesque Papeete port, Society Islands, where you'll board the sleek beauty M/Y Panorama II. Boarding Time: 3pm. Step on board and immerse yourself in a world of ambience and hospitality. A welcome drink awaits you and soon followed by a welcome dinner. As twilight descends, we set sail for the enchanting island of Moorea.

Moorea is often referred to as "The Magical Island," and is said to have been the muse behind the mythical Bali Hai from James Michener's Tales of the South Pacific. You can enjoy swimming, snorkeling and watersports from our swimming platform in this islands beautiful sapphire waters, followed by a delicious lunch. An enchanting 3.5-hour island tour is included where our qualified, local guide will regale you with captivating tales of Moorea's rich history, vibrant culture, and diverse ecology. Admire the lush Opunohu Valley, ascend the slopes of Mt. Tohi'e'a, and meander past the picturesque Cook's and Opunohu Bays and still have plenty of time to explore Moorea at your leisure before we set sail for our next destination, Huahine.

Huahine, often likened to the mythical Garden of Eden, emerges as a vast tropical paradise teeming with life. Today offers the freedom to explore Huahine at your own pace or partake in our meticulously crafted optional Private Motu Picnic and Snorkeling tour: board the comfortable, traditional outrigger canoe for a cruise to Huahine, there is a stop in the coral gardens for snorkeling among the many species of tropical fish, you will enjoy a delectable picnic on a white, sandy motu. We overnight in Huahine

A single day scarcely does justice to the allure of Huahine! Today, you have the freedom to explore Huahine at your leisure or opt for Our optional tour taking us in many of the island's temples and small villages offering a chance to see and feed the sacred blue-eyed eels of Faie Bay, as well as visit a vanilla plantation. Overnight at sea to Bora Bora.

Bora Bora reigns supreme as the crown jewel of the South Pacific, holding the spotlight as French Polynesia's undisputed star. Today, you can experience the essence of Bora Bora with a unique excursion aboard Le Truck, a vibrant journey lasting approximately 2.5 hours (included in cruise fares). Immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of Tahitian history, traditions, and cultures as your knowledgeable guide narrates the 22-mile road encircling this legendary island. Explore the villages of Farepiti, Faanui, and Anau, each adorned with ancient "Marae" shrouded in mystery. And as your adventure unfolds, be captivated by the breathtaking vistas from Matira Point, a vantage point offering unparalleled panoramas of paradise. Overnight in Bora Bora.

One day in Bora Bora is not enough, as you start your day, camera in hand, prepare for the awe-inspiring moment when the iconic Mount Otemanu graces your view. Once Bora Bora captivates your gaze, it's a memory that stays etched in your heart forever. Therefore, ensure your second day in Bora Bora is brimming with unforgettable moments that will linger with you for years to come. Overnight at sea to Taha’a.

Taha’a, also referred to as Vanilla Island, boasts an exquisite natural landscape. Its verdant valleys are adorned with lush banana, watermelon, and coconut plantations. Resembling a flower in shape, the island serves as a sprawling sanctuary for the prized Tahitian vanilla orchid. Taha'a shares a continuous coral reef and crystal-clear lagoon, enhancing its allure as an idyllic retreat. While the ship is at anchor, you can enjoy swimming, snorkelling and water sports from our swimming platform in the beautiful sapphire waters! Today, guests can opt for a leisurely exploration or embark on our enticing Vanilla Plantation & Rhumerie optional Shore Excursion, promising a delightful journey into Taha'a's aromatic world. Overnight in Taha’a.

With its name translating to "faraway heaven," Raiatea once stood as the paramount cultural and religious hub of the Society Islands. Today, Raiatea is believed to be a sacred resting place for the spirits of these ancestors, drawing pilgrims seeking spiritual connection. Our Shore Excursion today (included in the cruise fares), is to the Faaroa River with a Motu Beach Break, guests journey aboard a traditional Polynesian outrigger canoe. Arriving at a serene motu, or islet, immerse yourself in the warm sea and bask in the rejuvenating sun, a perfect interlude to your Raiatea exploration. Overnight in Raiatea.

Immerse yourself in the captivating tales and ancient legends, beckoning you to uncover its mysteries. Savour the freedom to craft your day at your leisure, or opt to join one of our tailored optional Shore Excursions, offering a deeper immersion into the island's unique ambiance, allowing you to embrace the essence of Mana. After dinner, set sail for Moorea.

Our voyage brings us back to Moorea. It's no wonder that Moorea continues to captivate; it's a true marvel of nature. Today grants you the freedom to explore at your own pace or partake in one of our optional shore excursions. Overnight at sea to Papeete.

As the morning sun graces Papeete Port, breakfast on board , before disembarkation at 09:00a.m Our dedicated Concierge stands ready to assist with any final arrangements, ensuring your journey concludes seamlessly.
